spec_data.Name: perl-PerlIO-via-Timeout
spec_data.Description:
This package implements a PerlIO layer, that adds read / write timeout.
This can be useful to avoid blocking while accessing a handle (file,
socket, ...), and fail after some time.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:09:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PerlIO layer that adds read & write timeout to a handle
